title: Libffm Stratified With Blend
description: IntroductionIt's just some minor changes to the great kernel libffm-model with predicting test data in each fold. Please Upvote the original kernel. Last part is a blend of some of best scoring public kernels with libffm predictions. Field-Aware Factorization is a powerful representation learning. Github here.
